title: One England, Two Countries? (with Andy Burnham)
itunes:title: One England, Two Countries? (with Andy Burnham)
description:
Andy Burnham, Mayor of Greater Manchester, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek that the Treasury should make it a central part of its mission to re-balance the economy from south to north. Plus, Bloomberg's Edward Evans and Alan Crawford join to talk about Scotland, as the SNP launches its election campaign.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
